title: 1986 Peterbilt 359 Dump Truck (DEF Converted) (Trailer NOT Included)
item_description:
1986 Peterbilt 359 Dump Truck (DEF Converted) (Trailer NOT Included)

  • Year: 1986
  • Manufacturer: Peterbilt
  • Model: 359 KP
  • Vin: 203400KP
  • License: 03822Z1 
    • Registration Expiration: 12/31/2021
    • Planned Non-Op REGISTRATION DEFERRED
  • GVWR: 80,000 Lbs
  • Odometer Reads: 461,749 (494 Hours)
  • Axels: 3
  • Transmission: Eaton Fuller
  • Diesel Emission Control Type: Selective Catalytic Reduction (Uses DEF Fluid)
  • Number of Tires: 10
  • Tire Size: 285/75R24.5
  • Brake Type: Air
  • Suspension Type: Air
  • Engine: Cummins X15-450SA Inline 6
  • Fuel Type: Diesel
  • Hitch Type: Pintle
  • Features:
    • Air Ride Seats
    • Air Conditioning
    • Adjustable Airbag Suspension
    • Certified Clean Air Idle
    • Jake Brake
  • Transfer Trailer (Lot 101) NOT Included

Note: Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, and Court Order will be mailed once the court order is received and the DMV paperwork is signed by the bankruptcy trustee. Please allow 1-2 weeks after the removal. Thank you for your patience. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, sales tax, and fees due to the DMV.
